nodes.text: Ganimed were a humanoid species, easily distinguished by the single horn on top of their hairless heads. They resembled the Advozse and were possilby related or a subspecies to them.

The character of Purong the Bounty Hunter was identified as being this species in The Mos Eisley Cantina Pop-Up Book. Purong was drawn to resemble a member of the Advozse species. It is possible that writers Kevin J. Anderson and Rebecca Moesta intended this character to be the same species (or even the same character) as Bom Vimdin.
